title: Jordan Belfort ( Wolf of Wall Street ) Interview and More
itunes:title: Jordan Belfort ( Wolf of Wall Street ) Interview and More
description:
Monday 10/3 - Today on the show we had author, motivational speaker, and former stockbroker Jordan Belfort or better known as the "Wolf of Wall Street" came by where he spoke about the art of sales, tonality and more. After, a discussion sparked in the interview about DJ Envy changing his name back in the day when he was a telemarketer, so he can be more susceptible to society we opened up the phone lines to see what our listeners thought of it. Moreover, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to the gospel group "Mary Mary" because Tina Campbell once said her christian values were compatible with Donald Trump and for Erica Campbell for denying her sister's statement.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Monday 10/3 - Today on the show we had author, motivational speaker, and former stockbroker Jordan Belfort or better known as the "Wolf of Wall Street" came by where he spoke about the art of sales, tonality and more. After, a discussion sparked in the interview about DJ Envy changing his name back in the day when he was a telemarketer, so he can be more susceptible to society we opened up the phone lines to see what our listeners thought of it. Moreover, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to the gospel group "Mary Mary" because Tina Campbell once said her christian values were compatible with Donald Trump and for Erica Campbell for denying her sister's statement.
